name: mathflow
description: Guidance for mathematical expression parsing and evaluation in .NET using NCalc and related libraries. USE FOR: runtime mathematical expression evaluation, user-defined formulas, rule engines with math expressions, parameterized calculations, spreadsheet-style formula evaluation. DO NOT USE FOR: symbolic algebra (use AngouriMath), numerical linear algebra (use Math.NET), machine learning (use ML.NET), scientific computing with matrices.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
